start.text: You're walking through the streets when a dog with no collar approaches. It drops a shimmering gold bar from its mouth in front of you and wags its tail.
start.title: A Surprising Encounter

gold_inspection.text: The gold bar feels heavy and genuine. The dog sits patiently, looking up at you with expectant eyes.
gold_inspection.title: Inspecting the Gold

choices.text: Head to a pawn shop with the gold

dog_licks_face.text: The dog happily licks your face. When you pull back, you notice it's pointing towards an alley with its paw.
dog_licks_face.title: Friendly Gesture

choices.text: Follow the dog into the alley
Give the dog a treat and move on

meet_owner.text: The dog leads you to a man who looks distraught. "Thank you for finding my dog and gold!" he says, offering you a reward.
meet_owner.title: Meeting the Owner

choices.text: Refuse and just be glad the dog is safe

pawn_shop.text: The pawn shop owner is amazed by the gold bar and offers a high price. The dog, however, looks sad.
pawn_shop.title: The Pawn Shop

choices.text: Change your mind and return the gold to the dog

secret_base.text: The dog reveals a secret base full of gold and treasures. There's a note: 'For the one who treats animals kindly.'
secret_base.title: The Secret Base

choices.text: Donate the treasure to animal shelters

grateful_ending.text: You accept the reward and the grateful owner showers you with more gifts. You and the dog become the best of friends.
grateful_ending.title: A Grateful Ending

heroic_ending.text: The man is touched by your kindness. News spreads of your good deed and the community celebrates you. The dog stays by your side as your loyal companion.
heroic_ending.title: Heroic Acts

rich_ending.text: With the gold and treasures, you live a life of luxury. However, sometimes you wonder about the adventurous dog and where it's off to next.
rich_ending.title: A Luxurious Life

funny_ending.text: The dog grabs the gold bar and trots off, only to return moments later with a funny hat. It seems the dog just wanted to trade for some fashionable attire!
funny_ending.title: A Comical Twist
